# Primary Care Tools Sources

## Licensing Note
These formulas and decision rules are derived from published research and public domain sources and are freely implementable with proper citation.

## Mifflin-St Jeor
- Mifflin MD, et al. Am J Clin Nutr. 1990;51:241-247. (BMR equation)
- StatPearls review summarizing energy expenditure equations.

## Harris-Benedict
- Harris JA, Benedict FG. Proc Natl Acad Sci USA. 1918-1919. (Original equations)
- Roza AM, Shizgal HM. Am J Clin Nutr. 1984;40:168-182. (Revised equations)

## Centor Score
- Centor RM, et al. Med Decis Making. 1981;1:239-246.
- AAFP review and guideline summary tables.

## McIsaac Score
- McIsaac WJ, et al. CMAJ. 1998;158:75-83. (Derivation)
- JAMA validation study (2004).

## Naegele's Rule
- StatPearls: Naegele's rule overview and limitations.
- Historical obstetrics references (19th century sources).
